titleStmt.title: The rump, or, The mirrour of the late times a new comedy / written by J. Tatham, Gent. ; acted many times with great applause at the Private House in Dorset-Court.
titleStmt.author: Tatham, John, fl. 1632-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid for R. Bloome,

notesStmt.note: Includes untitled songs without the music.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
